GLC공통교과과정: 글로벌인재학부 학생에 한하여 수강신청가능하며 타 전공학생 수강 불가
글로벌기초교육학부 학생에 한하여 수강신청가능하며 타 전공학생 수강 불가

교재 및 참고문헌: 1. Bible (New International Version or New Revised Standard Version)
2. Linda Woodhead, Christianity: A Very Short Introduction, New York; Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2004. (Kindle -  $7.69 in Amazon)
1. IPCC. Climate Change 2018: Special Report. IPCC, 2018.
2. 샐리 맥페이그/김준우 옮김. 『기후변화와 신학의 재구성』. 서울: 한국기독교연구소, 2008.(A Sallie McFague, New Climate for Theology: God, the World, and Global Warming, Fortress Press, 2008)
3. 이안 바버/이철우 옮김. 『과학이 종교를 만날 때』. 서울: 김영사, 2002. (Ian Barbour, When Science Meets Religion New York: HarperSanFrancisco, 2000.
4. Andrew Linzey, Creatures of the Same God : Explorations in Animal Theology. New York: Lantern Books, 2009.
5. Jung-bae Lee, “The Laity as Subjects of Religious Ceremonies: Constructing a Non-Dualistic Relationship between Christian Worship and Ancestral Rites.”
